data.comment: Today's referee, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade, has blown to start the match.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
In the minute 4, So close for Atletico Mineiro as Hyoran's shot comes back off the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
In the minute 5, Wilson for Coritiba is back on the field again.
The match at Independencia has been interrupted briefly for a check on Wilson, who is down injured.
Free kick Coritiba.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Throw-in high up the field for Atletico Mineiro in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 13, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Vargas goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade waits before resuming play because Federico Zaracho for Atletico Mineiro is still down.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Important block from the Coritiba defence as Eduardo Vargas fires in a strike for Atletico Mineiro.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Atletico Mineiro's area.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Coritiba throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Atletico Mineiro's Federico Zaracho is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 20, Coritiba pushes forward through Giovanni Augusto, whose finish on goal is saved.
Hyoran (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 21, Calebe is on a sub for Federico Zaracho for Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro's Nathan is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 23, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 26, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Rafinha for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Atletico Mineiro drive upfield and Keno gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Coritiba needs to be cautious. Atletico Mineiro have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Neilton of Coritiba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Neilton is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 34, Neilton is back on his feet again.
Atletico Mineiro's Hyoran gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro's Hyoran gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Coritiba at Independencia.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Coritiba are pushing forward but Giovanni Augusto's finish is wide of the goal.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Jefferson Savarino (Atletico Mineiro) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 41, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro just outside Coritiba's area.
Atletico Mineiro's Calebe breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 42, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 45, Atletico Mineiro's Keno gets in a shot on goal at Independencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Nathan (Atletico Mineiro) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Belo Horizonte.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 45, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Calebe (Atletico Mineiro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 45, In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Eduardo Vargas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The first-half is over at Independencia.
The second-half is underway at Independencia.
In the minute 46, Matheus Bueno is replacing Matheus Sales for the away team.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Atletico Mineiro drive upfield and Guga gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
In the minute 50, Atletico Mineiro have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 55, Free kick Coritiba.
Coritiba attack but Rhodolfo's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 57, Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Coritiba's half?
Atletico Mineiro are in shooting range from this free kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro drives forward and Hyoran gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 63, Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a second substitution, with Alan Franco replacing Calebe.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro attack through Junior Alonso. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 64, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Hyoran scores to make it 1-0 at Independencia.
In the minute 66, Great play from Junior Alonso to set up the goal.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Coritiba at Independencia.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Rafinha is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Robson (Coritiba) has replaced the possibly injured Rafinha.
In the minute 76, Robson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Coritiba.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Everson.
Everson is back on the pitch.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 78, The away team replace Hugo Moura with Pablo Thomaz.
Ezequiel Cerutti is replacing Neilton for Coritiba at Independencia.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Coritiba are coming forward and Pablo Thomaz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
The home team have replaced Nathan with Eduardo Sasha. This is the third substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's fourth substitution at Independencia with Igor Rabello replacing Eduardo Vargas.
In the minute 83, Goal! Eduardo Sasha extends Atletico Mineiro's lead to 2-0.
Giovanni Augusto for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Martin Sarrafiore is replacing Matheus Galdezani for Coritiba at Independencia.
In the minute 85, Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Guilherme Arana of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
In the minute 89, Atletico Mineiro pushes forward through Hyoran, whose finish on goal is saved.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Atletico Mineiro's Keno gets in a shot on goal at Independencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
